The claim was made by Republican preside: Ron Paul of Texas during a debate in Iowa on August 11, 2011.
The claim was fact: checked by PolitiFact Wisconsin, who had previously tested a similar claim from Gov. Scott Walker and found it to be false.
The claim was supported by the lowering: long-term rating to 'AA+' by Standard & Poor's on August 5, 2011.
The claim was further supported by inter: Poor's, Fitch Ratings, and the U.S. Treasury Department.
